--- title: "EasyPython Practice Ch4&5" author: Ahyeong Jeong date: "2024-07-17" categories: [EasyPython] --- ## p.84 혼자서 해보기 ### Q1. 다음 표의 내용을 데이터 프레임으로 만들어 출력해보세요. ::: {#20497999 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.DataFrame({"제품" : ["사과", "딸기", "수박"], "가격" : [1800, 1500, 3000], "판매량" : [24, 38, 13]}) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: ### Q2. 앞에서 만든 데이터 프레임을 이용해 과일의 가격 평균과 편매량 평균을 구해보세요. ::: {#34a4a5d9 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df[["가격", "판매량"]].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` 가격 2100.0 판매량 25.0 dtype: float64 ``` ::: ::: ## p.115 혼자서 해보기 ### Q1. mpg데이터를 불러와 복사본을 만드세요. ::: {#e0b7056d .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg = pd.read_csv("C:/Users/USER/Downloads/mpg.csv") mpg2 = mpg.copy() ``` ::: ### Q2. 복사본 데이터를 이용해 `cty`는 `city`로, `hwy`는 `highway`로 수정하세요. ::: {#6bedc0ef .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg2 = mpg2.rename(columns = {'cty' : 'city', 'hwy' : 'highway'}) mpg2.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 234 entries, 0 to 233 Data columns (total 11 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 manufacturer 234 non-null object 1 model 234 non-null object 2 displ 234 non-null float64 3 year 234 non-null int64 4 cyl 234 non-null int64 5 trans 234 non-null object 6 drv 234 non-null object 7 city 234 non-null int64 8 highway 234 non-null int64 9 fl 234 non-null object 10 class 234 non-null object dtypes: float64(1), int64(4), object(6) memory usage: 20.2+ KB ``` ::: ::: ### Q3. 데이터 일부를 출력해 변수명이 바뀌었는지 확인해 보세요. ::: {#e2f6c753 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg2.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv city highway fl class
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact
``` ::: ::: ## p.130 ### Q1. `midwest.csv`를 불러와 데이터의 특징을 파악하세요. ::: {#79252e3e .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} midwest = pd.read_csv("C:/Users/USER/Downloads/midwest.csv") midwest.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 437 entries, 0 to 436 Data columns (total 28 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 PID 437 non-null int64 1 county 437 non-null object 2 state 437 non-null object 3 area 437 non-null float64 4 poptotal 437 non-null int64 5 popdensity 437 non-null float64 6 popwhite 437 non-null int64 7 popblack 437 non-null int64 8 popamerindian 437 non-null int64 9 popasian 437 non-null int64 10 popother 437 non-null int64 11 percwhite 437 non-null float64 12 percblack 437 non-null float64 13 percamerindan 437 non-null float64 14 percasian 437 non-null float64 15 percother 437 non-null float64 16 popadults 437 non-null int64 17 perchsd 437 non-null float64 18 percollege 437 non-null float64 19 percprof 437 non-null float64 20 poppovertyknown 437 non-null int64 21 percpovertyknown 437 non-null float64 22 percbelowpoverty 437 non-null float64 23 percchildbelowpovert 437 non-null float64 24 percadultpoverty 437 non-null float64 25 percelderlypoverty 437 non-null float64 26 inmetro 437 non-null int64 27 category 437 non-null object dtypes: float64(15), int64(10), object(3) memory usage: 95.7+ KB ``` ::: ::: ### Q2. `poptotal`(전체인구) 변수를 `total`로 , `popasian`(아시아 인구) 변수를 `asian`으로 수정하세요. ::: {#7b493604 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} midwest = midwest.rename(columns = {'poptotal' : 'total', 'popasian' : 'asian'}) ``` ::: ### Q3. `total`, `asian` 변수를 이용해 '전체 인구 대비 아시아 인구 백분율' 파생변수를 추가하고, 히스토그램을 만들어 분포를 살펴보세요. ::: {#ebd536f3 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt midwest['asian_ratio'] = midwest['asian'] / midwest['total'] * 100 sns.histplot(data = midwest, x = 'asian_ratio') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw1_files/figure-html/cell-9-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ### Q4. 아시아 인구 백분율 전체 평균을 구하고, 평균을 초과하면 `'large'`, 그 외에는 `'small'`을 부여한 파생변수를 만들어보세요. ::: {#39f664e5 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np mean_asian = midwest['asian_ratio'].mean() midwest['asian_scale'] = np.where(midwest['asian_ratio'] > mean_asian, 'large', 'small') midwest.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9} ```{=html}
PID county state area total popdensity popwhite popblack popamerindian asian ... poppovertyknown percpovertyknown percbelowpoverty percchildbelowpovert percadultpoverty percelderlypoverty inmetro category asian_ratio asian_scale
0 561 ADAMS IL 0.052 66090 1270.961540 63917 1702 98 249 ... 63628 96.274777 13.151443 18.011717 11.009776 12.443812 0 AAR 0.376759 small
1 562 ALEXANDER IL 0.014 10626 759.000000 7054 3496 19 48 ... 10529 99.087145 32.244278 45.826514 27.385647 25.228976 0 LHR 0.451722 small
2 563 BOND IL 0.022 14991 681.409091 14477 429 35 16 ... 14235 94.956974 12.068844 14.036061 10.852090 12.697410 0 AAR 0.106731 small
3 564 BOONE IL 0.017 30806 1812.117650 29344 127 46 150 ... 30337 98.477569 7.209019 11.179536 5.536013 6.217047 1 ALU 0.486918 small
4 565 BROWN IL 0.018 5836 324.222222 5264 547 14 5 ... 4815 82.505140 13.520249 13.022889 11.143211 19.200000 0 AAR 0.085675 small

5 rows × 30 columns

``` ::: ::: ### Q5. `'large'`와 `'small'`에 해당하는 지역이 얼마나 많은지 빈도표와 빈도 막대 그래프를 만들어 확인해보세요. ::: {#9cdf682b .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.clf() freq_asian_scale = midwest['asian_scale'].value_counts() print(freq_asian_scale) freq_asian_scale.plot.bar(rot = 0) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` asian_scale small 318 large 119 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw1_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-2.png){width=575 height=429} ::: :::
